title: I\'d like to know which government maintains Airlie Rd. Its been years since the double yellow line that is supposed to run from one end to the other has been re-painted.In some areas its completely faided away. Its also been several years since the white lines marking the side of the lines has been painted. This would be especially helful for night driving. They have fixed a few potholes, but that seems to be it.
text:
Here's a previous MyReporter post that should answer your question:
